REDMOND, Wash.-Feb. 9, 2011-Microsoft Corp. today promoted Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services, said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer .
